Adrian Smallwood

Software Engineer

Las Vegas, NV

AQSmallwood@gmail.com

I am a skilled software engineer with experience building customer facing web clients and services. I believe computers are immensely powerful, and I find harnessing them to improve people’s lives rewarding. I enjoy building high quality services that are well-defined, highly available, appropriately monitored, and useful to internal and external customers.

  • Python Django, REST Framework, Flask, SQLAlchemy, PyTest
  • Java Spring MVC, Spring Boot, JDBC, JPA, JUnit, Mockito

  • Cloud Nginx, Redis, Memcached, Celery
  • Databases Postgres, DynamoDB, MongoDB, MySQL, Couchbase
  • Docker, C#, C++, Kotlin, REST, SOAP, GRPC, TDD, Certified ScrumMaster
